name: Darkest Safest
description:
This game is part of a Jam I joined called Mini Jam with 72Hours to meet the deadline and I'm on the 88th jam apparently. Lucky number I guess? idk.
The theme was "Rush" and the Limitation was "Tell a story with no text", meaning the game should have NO LETTERS WHATSOEVER.
Worked hard on the game even tho it's basically simple.
Made with Unreal Engine 4.
Hope you Enjoy the game <3

You're trapped in an Unknown Room for some reason.
You have a Flashlight and some weird device with a battery in your inventory.
You look behind you and you see a giant metal mysterious lookin door that is locked up tight.
You venture around for a minute and you find yet another mysterious PC with glowing colors turned on that is showing nothing but a single image.
You immediately figure out what's going on but right after you do a yet ANOTHER MYSTERIOUS red glowing floating lookin Robot starts to follow you with a loud banging noise that gives you the feeling that you should be avoiding this Robot at all cost.
You start running for your life until you lost sight of the Robot, it stopped following you while you hide there at the corner of the Unknown Room crying like a little kid that won't stop crying until it gets what it wants.
As your sobbing uncontrollably, you find YET ANOTHER PC infront of you but this time glowing a different color.
You approach it, doing whatever your doing with the PC. You calmed down and have set your mind to escape this Hellhole.
Each time you interact with the PC, your weird lookin device shows up an image similar to the one on the PC's screen with the numbers 0 and 3. You have to find 3 of them items scattered around your room before the battery goes empty and return it back to the PC with the matching image on your weird device for the PC to spit out a KEY. You need 3 keys to open the giant metal mysterious lookin door to reach your escape.
Good Luck! :D
